summary: Coldplay's Music of the Spheres World Tour promotes their latest albums. It's their first tour since the COVID-19 pandemic and they're trying to be eco-friendly by reducing carbon emissions. The tour started in 2022 and will end in 2025 at Wembley Stadium. They use pyrotechnics and confetti, but also have a rechargeable battery and plant trees for each ticket sold. Critics love it, and it's the most-attended tour ever, making over $1 billion. Coldplay even got praised for their climate action efforts.
title: Music of the Spheres World Tour
